name: Niosa Bliana
content: Niosa Bliana was a twelve-year Human girl who lived on the planet Tasariq during the Galactic Civil War. A pickpocket, Bliana had connections to the black marketeer Suraya and Tasari guide Valjak. The young girl would try to sell treasure maps and act as a guide to newcomers, and would attempt to pickpocket those who did not pay for her services.
